H0.text: Valence electrons are the nine electrons that all elements in group 9 possess.

H1.text: Shells are the nine electrons that all of the elements in group 9 possess.

H2.text: Ionic are the electrons that all of the elements in group 9 have nine of.

H3.text: Gradient is the type of electron that all elements in group 9 have nine of.

A4.text: In groups 1–12, the group number matches the number of valence electrons

A5.text: Valence shell is the set of orbitals
